diagram_logic_form: The measure of angle $JLM$ is $6x + 8$ degrees.
The measure of angle $MLK$ is $9x - 4$ degrees.
The line $JL$ is perpendicular to the line $JM$.
The line $KL$ is perpendicular to the line $KM$.
The length of the line $JM$ is equal to the length of the line $MK$.
line_instances: There are lines $JM$, $MK$, forming a triangle $JMK$.
There are lines $LJ$, $LK$, $LM$, forming a triangle $LJK$.
